title: Transforming Waste STEM Students Leading Media

transcript.text: As chair of the department of computing
technologies, we envision that we are

projects solving industry based problems
to capstone units in their final year
wherein students actually meet clients
to solve industry problems. We also look
into encouraging students to do
internship and work on site with the
industry partners that we build over
time and maintain good relationships.

As industry partner in collaboration
